Smart Toothbrush with App: A toothbrush that connects to a smartphone app, which tracks the user's brushing habits, provides personalized coaching, and gamifies the brushing experience with rewards and challenges.
Toothbrush with Built-in UV Light: A toothbrush that incorporates a built-in UV light to kill bacteria and viruses on the toothbrush bristles and handle, providing an extra layer of oral hygiene.

Electric Toothbrush with Voice Control: An electric toothbrush that can be controlled by voice commands, allowing users to easily switch between brushing modes, adjust the speed and pressure, and even set reminders for twice-daily brushing.

Toothbrush with Self-Sanitizing Mechanism: A toothbrush that has a self-sanitizing mechanism that uses UV light or hydrogen peroxide to kill germs and bacteria on the bristles and handle, providing an extra layer of oral hygiene.
Toothbrush with Built-in Water Flosser: A toothbrush that incorporates a built-in water flosser, providing an effective way to remove plaque and debris from between teeth and along the gum line.
